name: Samson & Delilah
overview: A simple and awkwardly presented single screen platformer with many options of play. In the book of Judges from the Old Testament is the story of Samson. The story takes place at a time when the people of Israel were enslaved by the Philistines. You know the story, he had great strength as long as he kept his long hair, but when Delilah cut it, he could be captured and blinded. So make your way to the pillars, you must avoid the guards, Delilah's shears, past any lions and to the arches to beat the level.
